alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Marion; Marshall; Monongalia; Ohio; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 10:01AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF SHOWERS WILL AFFECT BEAVER...VENANGO...BUTLER... ALLEGHENY...GREENE...NORTHWESTERN ARMSTRONG...WESTERN CLARION... NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE...NORTHWESTERN FOREST...EASTERN MERCER... WASHINGTON...EASTERN LAWRENCE...NORTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND...OHIO... WETZEL...MARSHALL...BROOKE...NORTHWESTERN MONONGALIA AND MARION COUNTIES... At 959 AM EST, radar indicated showers were located along a line extending from 13 miles southeast of Atlantic to Valley Grove. Movement was east at 50 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph are possible with these showers. Make sure to secure any loose outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Penn Hills, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Ross Township, McCandless Township, Monroeville, Cranberry, Moon Township, McMurray, Weirton, and McKeesport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 7 and 14. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 41. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 11 and 55. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 135. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 130 and 140, and between mile markers 156 and 160. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 15 and 55. Parkway North between mile markers 1 and 13. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 27 and 84.

area.areaDesc: Brooke; Marion; Marshall; Monongalia; Ohio; Wetzel
